summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4956 for the improvement of the alleys in block 16, Plat of Columbia, being the alley in the block bounded by Hudson Street, Ferdinand Street, 37th Avenue South and Rainier Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 56856, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
